form_builder.title: Contact Form
form_builder.text: Create beautiful forms using a simple Drag & Drop editor.
form_builder.custom_page_content: Fill in the form below and we will get in touch as soon as we can. [livesite-contact title="Contact request"]

module_tray_text.disabled: Add a contact form to your site

livesite_widget.title: LiveSite Widget
livesite_widget.text: Encourage clients to take actions and capture twice as many leads

payments.title: Payments Button
payments.text: Offer your clients a simple way to pay for your services
payments.custom_page_content: You are invited to securely pay online using any Credit Card or PayPal. Simply fill in the form below. [livesite-pay title="Contact request"]

module_tray_text.disabled: Add online payment options to your site

scheduler.title: Scheduler
scheduler.text: Self service appointment scheduling for your clients
scheduler.custom_page_content: We invite you to schedule an appointment online. See our available time below and pick a time that works best for you. [livesite-schedule title="Contact request"]

module_tray_text.disabled: Add online scheduling to your site
